<script lang="ts">
	import { DropdownMenu as DropdownMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	let { children, ...rest }: DropdownMenuPrimitive.RootProps = $props();
</script>

<DropdownMenuPrimitive.Root {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</DropdownMenuPrimitive.Root>

<script lang="ts">
	import { DropdownMenu as DropdownMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	let { children, ...rest }: DropdownMenuPrimitive.TriggerProps = $props();
</script>

<DropdownMenuPrimitive.Trigger {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</DropdownMenuPrimitive.Trigger>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { DropdownMenu as DropdownMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends DropdownMenuPrimitive.ContentProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, sideOffset = 4, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<DropdownMenuPrimitive.Portal>
	<DropdownMenuPrimitive.Content
		{sideOffset}
		class={cn(
			"z-50 min-w-[8rem] overflow-hidden rounded-xl glass-heavy p-1 shadow-glass-lg data-[state=open]:animate-slide-in data-[state=closed]:animate-slide-out",
			className
		)}
		{...rest}
	>
		{#if children}
			{@render children()}
		{/if}
	</DropdownMenuPrimitive.Content>
</DropdownMenuPrimitive.Portal>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { DropdownMenu as DropdownMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends DropdownMenuPrimitive.ItemProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
		inset?: boolean;
	}

	let { class: className, children, inset = false, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<DropdownMenuPrimitive.Item
	class={cn(
		"relative flex cursor-pointer select-none items-center rounded-lg px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-none transition-colors hover:bg-glass-light focus:bg-glass-light data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50",
		inset && "pl-8",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</DropdownMenuPrimitive.Item>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { DropdownMenu as DropdownMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	let { class: className, ...rest }: DropdownMenuPrimitive.SeparatorProps = $props();
</script>

<DropdownMenuPrimitive.Separator
	class={cn("-mx-1 my-1 h-px bg-glass-border", className)}
	{...rest}
/>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { DropdownMenu as DropdownMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: DropdownMenuPrimitive.GroupHeadingProps = $props();
</script>

<DropdownMenuPrimitive.GroupHeading
	class={cn("px-2 py-1.5 text-xs font-semibold text-muted-foreground", className)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</DropdownMenuPrimitive.GroupHeading>
